Voatsiperifery Pepper. Description A very rare and little known spice even on its island. Wild Madagascan pepper or Voatsiperifery Pepper (Piper borbonense) is a native pepper of Madagascar, has a pungent taste, earthy and woody rather, a wee bit sweet and exudes a distinct fragrance and bears citrus notes, all long lasting and without rage.

Madagascar is undoubtedly one of Africa's most fascinating countries, and certainly one of the continent's most unique.
